sentences.english: He would give entire earnings to Campbell's family from succeeding bouts.
sentences.chinese: 而他以後比賽的所有獎金將全部交給坎貝爾的家人。

sentences.english: Hargett sank the ball with his brother’s 9 iron to win the prize.
sentences.chinese: 哈蓋特用他兄弟的球杆揮杆進洞贏得了獎金。

sentences.english: The divisions bonus pool is divvied up - in large part - on the basis of the rankings.
sentences.chinese: 部門的獎金總額很大程度上是按評估等級分配的。

sentences.english: I got bupkis for my bonus.
sentences.chinese: 我一分錢獎金也沒拿到。

sentences.english: American-style bonuses and long-term incentive plans are now the norm.
sentences.chinese: 美國式的獎金和長期激勵計劃現在已成爲規範。

sentences.english: Almost nobody trusts the bonus system.
sentences.chinese: 幾乎沒有人相信獎金制度。

sentences.english: You'll get bonus at the end of each year.
sentences.chinese: 年底你會得到年終獎金。

sentences.english: We give you this bonus as approval of your work and for encouragement.
sentences.chinese: 獎金是對你的工作的肯定，以資鼓勵。

sentences.english: I agree totally with the criticisms of excess in pay and bonuses.
sentences.chinese: 我全然同意關於多餘的工資及獎金的批評。

sentences.english: One should look at executive bonus with a slightly dispassionate approach.
sentences.chinese: 大家應該稍微冷靜冷靜，理智看待高管獎金這事。

sentences.english: Actual slot machines are far more complicated, and balancing the payout is tricky.
sentences.chinese: 實際的老虎機要複雜得多，並且結算獎金十分棘手。

sentences.english: Indiscriminate price rises for some commodities were often directly related to the pursuit of bonuses by certain enterprises.
sentences.chinese: 有些商品亂漲價，也與一些企業追求多得獎金有關。

sentences.english: Annual bonus includes two parts, the fixed bonus and variable bonus.
sentences.chinese: 年度獎金包括兩部分，固定獎金和浮動獎金。

sentences.english: He agreed to divide the prize between Tom and Ann.
sentences.chinese: 他同意把這筆獎金分給湯姆和安兩個人。
